titleStmt.title: SII 7.128: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 128. (A.R. No. 116 of 1900). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE FIRST PRAKARA OF THE TRIVIKRAMA-PERUMAL TEMPLE AT TIRUKOILUR, TIRUKOILUR TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . samastabhuvanaikavira candrakulamaṁgalapradipa madhurāpurimahendra keraḷakulakāḷāndhakāradivākara
coḷavaṁśavārirāśivaḍhabānala laṁkāpatikāḷakūṭa kadana kāḷakaṇṭha karṇāṭakarikaḷabhakaṇṭhīravakṣemā
suravidāraṇanarasiṁha kāṭhakavaṁśavaiśvānara jayan=tamaṁgala purādhīśvara vīragaṇḍakopālabhujaṁgavihaṁgarāja kā
ñcīpuradurggaracitasāmmrājyāabhiṣeka gaṇapatigandhagajakūṭapākala bahuvidhavairidurggabhañcana praṇatarājasthāpanā
cāryya tribhuvanarājādhirāja parameśvara śrīvikramapāṇḍyadevaṟku yāṇṭu 8vatu taṉunāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu Aṣṭamiyum ⌈
veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Attattunāḷ malāṭākiya jaṉaṉātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu tirukkovalūr
nāyaṉār tiruviṭaikaḻināyaṉārkku rājarājavaḷanāṭṭut tirumuṉaippāṭik kiḻāmurnāṭṭuk koṭṭiḷampākkattu
k kuṇanalluḻāṉ Araiyaṉ tiruvalañcuḻiuṭaiyāṉ Aḻakapperumāṉāṉa kāṭuveṭṭiyeṉ Iṉ
ṉāyaṉār tirumukamaṇṭalam toṉṟa perumāḷ tirumeṉikku naṉṟāka nāṉ vaitta vikkiramapāṇṭiyaṉ
tuṭar tirununtāviḷakku Iraṇṭukku Iṉṉāyaṉār tirunāmattāl vilaikoṇṭu viṭṭa peṇṇaivaṭaka
rai vāṇakoppāṭināṭṭu maṟuvūrakarattu mahāsabhaiyārpakkal vilaikoṇṭa nilamāvatu cite
vivatikku kiḻakku coḻakulacuntaravāykkālukku vaṭakku mutal kaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñ catirattu
kiḻakkaṭaiyak kallaṉ Eṉṟu per kūvappaṭṭa taṭi Oṉṟiṉāl perumpaṭi kuḻi muṉṉūṟṟorupa
ttiraṇṭaraiyum Iyvatikku kiḻakku Aracarkaḷātittaṉ vāykkālukku vaṭakku muṉṟāṅ kaṇṇā
ṟṟu nālāñ catirattu perumpaṭi koraippaḷḷattil taṭi Oṉṟu kuḻi nūṟṟeṇpatteḻaraiyum Āka naṉcai kuḻi Aiñ
ñūṟum puṉcai nilattu tirunta Aṇaivāykkālukku kiḻakku Ākāracūraviṇṇakar Emperummāṉ tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattukku
kiḻakku tiruviṭaikaḻi nāyaṉār tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattukku teṟku Ivvakarattil nāyaṉār tevatāṉattukku meṟku kuḻi
Aiññūṟu Āka kuḻi Āyiramum karaṭiyāṟāṉa viratamuṭittapāṇṭiyaccaruppetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyār pak
kal vilaikoṇṭa Ivvakarattil naṉcainilattil kiḻpāṟkellai Ivvakarattu vikkiramapāṇṭiyavi
ṇṇakar Emperumāṉ tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattukku meṟkkum teṉpāṟkellai kiḻakkunokkip
pokiṟa peruvāykkālukkum poṉṉi Eḻupati ṉuṭpaṭa vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai nāvalkaraikku muṉṟāntarat
tukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai nāṟṟaṅkāl Oḻuṅkukku teṟkum Iṉṉāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa patiṉāraṭi
k kolāl taṭi palaviṉāl kuḻi Eṇṇūṟṟeṭṭum puṉcai nilattu vikkiramapāṇṭiyaviṇṇakar Emperumāṉ
tiruviṭaiyāṭṭa puṉceykku kiḻakkum paḻuṅkūr Ellaikku teṟku patiṉāraṭik kolāl kuḻi Eṇṇūṟum Āka kuḻi
1000 6 100 8m Āka kuḻi 2 1000 6 100 8m AkaraIṟaiyilippaṭi koyil tāṉattār paṟṟi nāḷ Oṉṟukku kuḻaiyaṉ nāḻiyāl nā
ḻi Uriy ney Aḷantu viral piramāṇam nāltiri Iṭṭu Ittiruviḷakku Iraṇṭum cantirātittavaṟ celvatākak kal
veṭṭikkuṭutteṉ kāṭuveṭṭiyeṉ Ivai koṭṭiḷampākkamuṭaiyāṉ Aḻakapperumāṉāṉa kāṭuveṭṭi Eḻuttu
Itu śrīvaiyiṣṇava rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.128 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
